scripts.import-generics: node scripts/import/continents && node scripts/import/countries && node scripts/import/cities
scripts.import-generics-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod node scripts/import/continents && node scripts/import/countries && node scripts/import/cities
scripts.database: npm run create-database && npm run create-domains
scripts.import: npm run import-generics && npm run import-items
scripts.import-prod: npm run import-generics-prod && npm run import-items-prod
scripts.export: node scripts/export/continents && node scripts/export/countries && node scripts/export/cities && node scripts/export/movies && node scripts/export/shows
scripts.export-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod node scripts/export/continents && node scripts/export/countries && node scripts/export/cities && node scripts/export/movies && node scripts/export/shows
scripts.app: npm run database && npm run tables && npm run import
scripts.app-prod: npm run database && npm run tables && npm run import-prod
